TopicTitle: Only female kerbals have eva monoprop

Articles.Content:
OK, this is a weird one. I have a bunch of mods installed, but none that should doing this deliberately. I have Breaking Ground but not Making History.

Only my female Kerbals have monoprop when they go on EVA. The ladies get 5.0 units. The guys get 0.0.

I had kerbalism installed, then removed it. I now have TAC life support installed. As far I know, these are my only mods that might be doing anything to kerbals on EVA.

I started a new sandbox game and it happens in a completely fresh save. Val and any female kerbals I hire have monoprop. Jeb, Bill, Bob and any male kerbals I hire do not.

Any ideas?

 

=====

 

I removed KIS, KAS, and TAC-LS. No change. I deleted my module manager cache files. No change. Still only female kerbals have monoprop.

Edited August 15, 2019 by mikegarrison
more info

OK, solved my own issue. Kerbalism has two folders in the Game Data folder. One is kerbalism, the other is kerbalism config. I had only removed kerbalism.

When I removed "kerbalism config" then "monoprop" stopped being an eva resource and was replaced with "EVA fuel". Now my male kerbals also have this.
